item.title: Load Balancing Applications with HAProxy and Docker
item.description: A tutorial for a real world docker use case. Recently I read a lot of articles about load balancing applications with Docker, Docker Compose, and Docker Swarm for my work. We have a couple of hundreds of instances and we need to manage them and do load balancing between them. There are a lot of articles about this topic, but sadly the use case they present is quit simple and because of that they really donâ€™t help.
